greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, infinite lower triangular Toeplitz matrix with A078008 in every column convolved with A001333.
comment: Row sums = A001333: (1, 1, 3, 7, 17, 41,...). Sum of n-th row terms = rightmost term of next row.
formula: Let M = an infinite lower triangular Toeplitz matrix with A078008 (1, 0, 2, 2, 6, 10, 22, 42, 86, 170,...). Let Q = the eigensequence of that triangle prefaced with a 1: (1, 1, 1, 3, 7, 17,...) where A001333 = (1, 1, 3, 7, 17,...). The triangle = M * Q.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, May 25 2009
